entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low zero.

entry.title: Saturday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Rain mixed with snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon then becoming west 20 gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 12:25 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
